text:
I only knew this place last year,
Recommended by my yoga friend Joyce.
Once tried their food, I really loved it!
It has the Home-cooked taste yet very affordable. A lot of variety and flavour plus the uncle and aunty are very friendly!
They very hardworking and kind people.
I always dabao for my kids when one the way pick them up from school.
Hope uncle and aunty keep fit and healthy so they can continue cook and serve us the yummy vegetarian food! Thanks ðŸ¤©
Serving the vegetarian community by offering value food. Good variety. Busy when 1st & 15th of lunar month.

BEST vegetarian bee hoon I ever had in my life. I always tell my friends that this stall sells the best veg bee hoon in the world hahaha:> I really canâ€™t find any other stall in Spore that have such homely taste.
Super yummy vegetarian food and a good variety to choose from. Must try!

Queue is always seen at the stall, many of my colleagues have mentioned that their vegetarian food was nice. Finally had a chance to check them out.

I have ordered a packet of fried Bee Hoon with curry vegetables including tau pok, vegetarian char siew & goose and etc. Look at how generous the portion was given to me by the kind uncle, and it only cost me about $3.50. The ingredients have fully covered my bee hoon underneath.

I love their curry vegetables, curry was light and yet flavourful, especially when you bite on the tau pok, the gravy oozed in your mouth. Other ingredients were great as well.

Besides that they have other dishes too, will come back to try them soon~
